If you are HIV positive
If you are HIV positive your 
management and delivery will 
depend	on	the	effectiveness	
of your anti-retroviral (ARV) 
treatment. An elective 
caesarean delivery (see page 
114) may be necessary, but 
not always. Your doctor will 
discuss this with you. Not 
attending for, or not taking 
the treatment as prescribed 
will	significantly	increase	the
